articles.description: Northern Arc Capital IPO | The IPO comprises a fresh issuance of shares worth Rs 500 crore, and an offer-for-sale of 2.1 crore equity shares by several investors.
articles.content:
Chennai-based financial services company Northern Arc Capital has filed the preliminary papers again with the SEBI for fund raising via public issue on February 2.
The IPO comprises a fresh issuance… [+3118 chars]

articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Eicher forays into small commercial vehicle segment, unveils EV truck - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Eicher has entered SCV segment with its "Pro Business Pro Planet" range of vehicles. It will initially roll out the electric variant, and later expand its offerings to include clean CNG and diesel variants.
articles.content: Eicher Trucks and Buses on February 3 said it has entered the small commercial vehicle (SCV) segment with the global unveiling of its innovative 'EV-First Eicher Truck' at the Bharat Mobility Global … [+1005 chars]

articles.author: Varsha Chandnani
articles.title: Clean Science And Technology Q3 Results: Profit Falls 25% - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Clean Science and Technology's Q3 revenue declined 17.7% to Rs 194.7 crore as against Rs 237.3 crore over the same period last year.
articles.content:
Clean Science and Technology Ltd.'s profit dropped 25% during the quarter-ended December, according to an exchange filing on Saturday. 
Sequentially, the net profit grew 21%.
